name: PHP Placeholder Images
body:
Usage (all parameters are optional):
<img src="placeholder.php?size=400x150&bg=eee&fg=999&text=Generated+image" alt="Placeholder image" /> ![Placeholder image](https://rawgithub.com/skymaiden/php-placeholder-images/master/placeholder.php?size=400x150&bg=eee&fg=999&text=Generated+image) Inspired by http://placehold.it/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
